name: Charles Bukowski (1920-1994)
influences: Anton Chekhov, James Thurber, Franz Kafka, Knut Hamsun, Ernest Hemingway, John Fante, Louis-Ferdinand Céline, Robinson Jeffers, Fyodor Dostoyevsky, D.H. Lawrence, Ezra Pound, Conrad Aiken, Sherwood Anderson
influenced: Billy Childish, Henry Rollins, Jason Thornberry
